targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_used WHERE time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;

panels.title: 开发者使用率，流行度最高的数据库（Used / Popularity）

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_loved WHERE time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;

panels.title: 开发者最喜爱，最钦慕的数据库（Loved / Admired）

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_wanted WHERE time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;

panels.title: 开发者最想要，最渴望的数据库（Wanted / Desired）

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_used ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_loved ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_wanted ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, * FROM dbrank.sf_used ORDER BY 1,2;

panels.description: Database used ratio by Professional Developers

targets.rawSql: SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, * FROM dbrank.sf_loved ORDER BY 1,2;

panels.title: 喜爱度 / Loved

targets.rawSql: SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, * FROM dbrank.sf_wanted ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_used WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle') AND time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_loved WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle') AND  time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_wanted WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle') AND  time = '2023-01-01' ORDER BY 3 DESC;

panels.description: Database used ratio by Professional Developers

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_used WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle') ORDER BY 1,2;

panels.title: Used

targets.rawSql: SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_loved WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle')  ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT time, name AS metric, value FROM dbrank.v_wanted WHERE name in ('PostgreSQL', 'MySQL', 'SQL Server', 'Oracle') ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, pgsql, mysql, oracle, mssql FROM dbrank.sf_used ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, pgsql, mysql, mssql, oracle FROM dbrank.sf_loved ORDER BY 1,2;
SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year,  pgsql, mysql, mssql, oracle  FROM dbrank.sf_wanted ORDER BY 1,2;

SELECT used.year,
       used.pgsql AS "PgSQL Used",
       used.mysql AS "MySQL Used",
       prof.pgsql AS "PgSQL Used (Prof)",
       prof.mysql AS "MySQL Used (Prof)",
       noob.pgsql AS "PgSQL Used (Noob)",
       noob.mysql AS "MySQL Used (Noob)"
    FROM
(SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, pgsql, mysql FROM dbrank.sf_used ORDER BY 1) used
LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, pgsql, mysql FROM dbrank.sf_used_prof ORDER BY 1) prof ON used.year = prof.year
LEFT OUTER JOIN
(SELECT extract(year FROM time) AS year, pgsql, mysql FROM dbrank.sf_used_noob ORDER BY 1) noob ON used.year = noob.year;

panels.title: Used by ( All | Prof | Noob ) Developers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, 'All'          AS name, pgsql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used WHERE time = '2023-01-01'
UNION ALL
SELECT time, 'Prof' AS name, pgsql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used_prof WHERE time = '2023-01-01'
UNION ALL
SELECT time, 'Noob'     AS name, pgsql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used_noob WHERE time = '2023-01-01'

SELECT time, 'All'          AS name, mysql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used WHERE time = '2023-01-01'
UNION ALL
SELECT time, 'Prof' AS name, mysql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used_prof WHERE time = '2023-01-01'
UNION ALL
SELECT time, 'Noob'     AS name, mysql AS value FROM dbrank.sf_used_noob WHERE time = '2023-01-01'

panels.description: Purple Left is PostgreSQL, Blue downward is MySQL
